entry.string:
Hello! Thanks for visiting the Jenkins Essential Training repo on GitHub.
If you are working with the exercise files and see this message, you have successfully connected to the repo.
If you are using the repo with a specific lesson, you will need to update your project configuration to use the path to the Jenkins file for that lesson.
For example, if you are working with lesson 05_02, you will need to update the 'Script Path' in the SCM configuration to use:
Ch05/05_02-publish-reports/Jenkinsfile
Thanks again for checking out this repo.
If you run into any problems or have questions, please use the Q&A section for this course on Linked In Learning.
